newsitem.title: PHILIPPINES: Ultrana to raise capital to one bln pesos.
newsitem.headline: Ultrana to raise capital to one bln pesos.

text.p: Oil and mine explorer Ultrana Energy and Resources Corp said on Tuesday its board had approved a plan to increase its authorised capital to one billion pesos from its present 100 million pesos.
Vice chairman Robert Cokeng told the Securities and Exchange Commission that it would change the par value of its stocks to one peso per share from one centavo each.
The board also said it planned to change the primary purpose of its company to become a holding company from the present mining and oil exploration firm.
The resolutions are yet to be approved at special stockholders' meeting scheduled for November 18.
